Function Documentation

template<class function>
void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot< function >::createCustomFunction ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, static, inherited]

Factory method to create a new customized Function of type R^3->R.

C++ Template Implementation: CustomFunctionSlot

Description: Implementation for createCustomFunction() and createCustomSurface()

Author:
: Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>, (C) 2008
Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution This function template is called by each slot with the correct function type as template parameter.
Sets F to the newly created Function, checks the corresponding menu item, updates the ValuesDialog and redraws. Does some error handling in case the Function could not be loaded.

References C4DView::AssignValues(), ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), ValuesDialogImpl::dv(), C4DView::F, C4DView::Redraw(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), C4DView::UpdateStatus(), C4DView::Values, ValuesDialogImpl::vmax(), and ValuesDialogImpl::vmin().

template<class function>
RealFunction * C4DView::TemplatedRealFunctionFactory< function >::createFunction ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, virtual, inherited]

Factory method to create a Function object.

C++ Template Implementation: TemplatedFunctionFactory, TemplatedSurfaceFactory

Description: Implementation for creatFunction() resp. createSurface()

Author:
: Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>, (C) 2008
Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution The type of the created Function is supplied as template parameter to the TemplatedFunctionFactory object owning this method.

Implements RealFunctionFactory.

References ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), ValuesDialogImpl::dv(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), C4DView::Values, ValuesDialogImpl::vmax(), and ValuesDialogImpl::vmin().
